item.title: Getting started with cocos2d-x
item.description: Installation or Setup(Mac OS X) # OVERVIEW # cocos2d-x is an open source, cross-platform game engine. It allows developers to code in C++, Lua and Javascript deployment into iOS, Android, Windows Phone, Mac OS X, Windows Desktop and Linux. PREREQUISITES # Build Requirements Mac OS X 10.7+, Xcode 4.6+ Windows 7+, VS 2012+ Ubuntu 12.10+, CMake 2.6+ Python 2.7.5 NDK, JDK, ANT (Android development) Runtime Requirements iOS 5.0+ for iPhone / iPad games Android 2.
